resources.string:
Hi!

I just got MessageMe, a new messaging app, and it's awesome! If you don't have it yet, download it and check it out!

Here's a link to download the app: http://msg.me/c/ZZ

Once you get it, you should see me in your contacts but if not send me the pin in your profile and I'll add you :)
Please make sure you\'re not in Airplane Mode and have access to WiFi or a cell network.
Please double check your wireless & network settings and try again
The connection timed out, please try again later
The phone number is not in an expected format. Please correct it and try again (there is no need to include the country code).
An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
You cannot install an older version of the application over the top of a newer one.\n\nIf you really want to install the older version, you must completely uninstall this version of MessageMe first.
A new version of MessageMe is available.
A required update is available for MessageMe. Please update to continue.
Please try launching the app again. If the problem persists please contact support@messageme.com
Error refreshing contacts, no Internet connection
Tell your friends to go to the link above on their mobile phone to get MessageMe and start texting with you for free today!
Play or pause this voice message
The image you chose is too large, or your device may be running low on memory. Please choose a smaller image or try again later.
Please check you have enough space available in your internal storage.
Your device does not appear to have Google Maps installed. Please install Google Maps and try again.
The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please double check and try again.
Your new password must be at least 5 characters long.
Please double check and try again.
The email address you entered is not valid. Please double check and try again.
The e-mail you entered is already registered with a MessageMe user. If you are the account owner, you may wish to login instead.
The email you entered does not belong to any account. Please double check and try again.
Please double check your phone number (include your country code) and your password and try again.
The phone number you entered does not belong to any account. Please double check your phone number (include your country code) and try again.
We couldn\'t find an account associated with: %s
We\'re re-sending an SMS with a verification code to you at %s. If you don\'t receive it soon, please contact support.
Please update to view this message
The messages in this conversation will be cleared permanently.
Your current location is temporarily unavailable
Error downloading selected image, please try again later.
Are you sure you want to continue?
There was an error uploading media, please try again later
Your friends can add you using this pin
Image upload has failed, please try again
There was an issue getting the correct date and time from your device. Please go to your device\'s Settings > Date & Time, set the date and time to Automatic, and try again.
You\'ve blocked this user. Unblock them to send a message.
You\'ve been blocked by this user and can\'t send them messages.
You cannot forward to %1$s. You have been blocked by %2$s
You\'ve been blocked by %s and cannot add them to the group.
We can\'t find the person you want to add to the group.
%1$s may not be added to %2$s. You have been blocked by %3$s.
%1$s may not be added to %2$s. You have blocked %3$s.
You cannot send or receive messages from %s
Unblock %s to send and receive messages
Would you like to add %s to your Contact List?
Please select at least one member.
Unable to leave room. Please try again later.
You won\'t be able to join the room again!
Please wait until the image is downloaded
MessageMe encountered an issue while saving the image to the Gallery.
Please make sure an SD card is inserted and writable and try again.
The SD card is full. Please free some space and try again.
Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number
The number you entered is already associated with an account. If you are the account owner, you may wish to login instead.
Select your current country of residence to find friends that are already on MessageMe.
We just sent you an SMS with a verification code to your number at
Enter the 3 digit verification code below
The pin you entered is incorrect. Please double check the SMS we sent you and retry.
Let your friends know who you are
The email is already registered with a MessageMe user.
Would you like to complete your profile with Facebook?
%s, You seem to already have an account
Enter your email and choose a password to log in with later
Error linking your Facebook account, please try again later
Sent location thumbnail, press to view
Sent photo thumbnail, press to view
Sent song thumbnail, press to listen
Sent video thumbnail, press to play
Sent YouTube thumbnail, press to play
Received location thumbnail, press to view
Received photo thumbnail, press to view
Received song thumbnail, press to listen
Received video thumbnail, press to play
Received YouTube thumbnail, press to play
Enter their phone number, email or pin
Your friend may not have MessageMe. Invite them to start texting for free with you today!
Please enter a valid email, phone or pin
We couldn\'t find anyone. Please double check what you entered and try again.
%s was added to your Contact List.
%s was removed from your Contact List.
You changed the group\'s name to %s
Connect with friends more easily! Your information is never displayed publicly.
Please select the \'Save logs\' checkbox below, wait for the problem to occur again, then press the \'Send Logs\' button.
Logging is ON, please reproduce the problem again now
The log file was too large to email
Failed to launch the email application
Please provide detailed steps explaining the problem that is occurring. Thank you for your help!
Would you like to find friends by syncing your device\'s address book with MessageMe?
We hope you have fun sending your friends\u2026
Tell us what you think at feedback@messageme.com
300 Brannan St, San Francisco, CA, USA
Please enter the email associated with your account.
An email has been sent to the address you provided with instructions on how to reset your password.
An error occurred. Please email support@messageme.com for help resetting your password.
Messages will only be received when MessageMe is open. To turn on notifications, setup a Google account, install the Google Play Store and restart your device.
Messages will only be received when MessageMe is open. To turn on notifications, setup a Google account and restart your device.
Messages will only be received when MessageMe is open. To turn on notifications, install the Google Play Store and restart your device.
MessageMe encountered an issue while enabling notifications. Notifications are temporarily unavailable.
MessageMe was unable to detect a camera on this device.
You do not seem to have an app installed that can take a photo.
MessageMe was unable to detect an application to record video.
You do not seem to have an app installed that is able to play this video file.
If you enjoy using MessageMe, take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
You\'ve selected %s invites to be sent via SMS. Carrier charges may apply.
Your invites are being sent. Thanks for your support!
The image does not appear to be available.
You can now send stickers from %s to your friends.
You don\'t have any sticker packs installed.
You haven\'t purchased any sticker packs.
